message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs. After careful consideration and evaluation, we believe this product would be invaluable to you. We're offering it to you at a special introductory price of $2000000. This exclusive opportunity won't last long, and we're confident it will provide significant benefits to you. Let's discuss how we can make this a mutually beneficial transaction.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but my budget is limited. I am willing to pay up to $1500000 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations.
